Code Và Css :

Code :

<code>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    //ChangeBgChip
          $(function () {
           $("#custom_submit").click(function () {
              var chipbg = $("#custom_input").val();
    $("body").css("background-image", "url('" + chipbg + "')");
          });
       });</script>

    <div class="bodycb"><div id="custom_url"><input type="text" id="custom_input" value="Link Image…" onclick="if(this.value=='Link Image…')this.value='';" onblur="if(this.value=='')this.value='Link Image…';"><strong id="custom_submit">Change</strong></div></div>

</code>
